description:
Her audience is taken on a journey through different sounds and environments
such as Fado and traditional Portuguese music, in an interpretation that is
intense and dynamic yet guided by sensitivity and delicacy, and with a very
Portuguese flavour and identity. The strings of her guitar explore new sounds
and musical genres such as jazz, world music and Portuguese music, but always
with the fundamental authenticity of Fado.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: Marta Pereira Da Costa

performer.description: Marta Pereira da Costa is a pioneer in professionally playing Portuguese guitar in Fado across the world. In a territory historically occupied by men, she made this instrument hers, and brought it to the forefront of music.
performer.name: Marta Pereira Da Costa

description:
Together, they form The Next Dimension, a power trio set to captivate
audiences with their debut project. With their extensive global performance
experience and unique musical talents, they offer a seamless fusion of jazz
sophistication, world influences, and dynamic rock energy, creating a
captivating and innovative sound.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: The Next Dimension

performer.description: For over 15 years, they have been the signature sound behind John McLaughlin’s electric band, 'The 4th Dimension.' Now, the irrepressible drummer and composer Ranjit Barot, the legendary drummer, composer, and keyboard player Gary Husband, and the inimitable bass player and composer Etienne Mbappé are embarking on an exciting new journey.
performer.name: The Next Dimension

description:
The Langas and Manganiyars preserve the rich cultural heritage of their land,
captivating audiences with their soulful performances that tell timeless
stories of love, valor, and devotion.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: Sanskriti Sarita - Langas & Manganiyars

performer.description: From the golden sands of Rajasthan, experience the enchanting voices of the Langas and Manganiyars. These folk artists, known for their raw and rustic vocals, will transport you to the heart of the desert, where their melodies have echoed across the dunes for centuries. Their music, deeply rooted in the vibrant folk traditions of Rajasthan, celebrates the essence of life with lively, lilting strains that have been lovingly passed down through generations.
performer.name: Langas & Manganiyars

description:
This exceptional performance is a cultural journey that bridges the diverse
musical landscapes of India. The fusion of Fakira's Bengal folk with the
Langas & Manganiyars' Rajasthani melodies creates a rich tapestry of sound
that celebrates the enduring beauty and cultural richness of India's heritage.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: Sanskriti Sarita - Fakira X Langas & Manganiyars

performer.description: Bringing together two bands from the cultural hubs of India, we present Fakira, the torchbearers of Bengal’s ancient folk traditions, and the Langas & Manganiyars from Rajasthan, the custodians of desert melodies. This extraordinary collaboration brings forth two distinct yet deeply rooted musical traditions, offering a unique blend of rhythm and soul.
performer.name: Fakira X Langas & Manganiyars
